mapper.select:
select tut.ID,tut.V_REMARK,tut.V_MONEY,tut.V_TOPUP_TIME,tsub.USER_ACCOUNT,tsub.USER_NAME,tut.V_STATUS from t_user_topup tut left join t_sys_user_base tsub on tut.V_TOPUP_USER = tsub.USER_ID
and tut.V_TOPUP_USER = #{USER_ID}
and tsub.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{USER_NAME}, '%')
order by tut.V_TOPUP_TIME desc
